T02TD3083E:177b-1: a'arya si t'a ta pa tre aa pa r'a dzi t'a n'a ma no pi k'a / bod skad du /
T02TD3083E:177b-2: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3083E:177b-3: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3083E:177b-4: lha mo gdugs dkar can bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02TD3083E:177b-5: gnas dben par khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD3083E:177b-6: rang skad cig gis lha mor bskyed pa'i aom gyi 'od kyis 'phags ma ri khrod ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la phyag bya ste /
T02TD3083E:178a-0: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bdun rnam dag @178a * //
T02TD3083E:178a-3: ye shes kyi tshogs bsag par bya'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-4: de'i ngang las snying ga'i aom las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas /
T02TD3083E:178a-5: tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar mo aom gyis mtshan par gyur /
T02TD3083E:178a-6: de las 'od zer sku phra mor 'phros 'dus pa las bdag nyid lha mo gdugs dkar can sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD3083E:178a-7: spyan gnyis las byams pa dang snying rje'i 'od zer 'phro ba /
T02TD3083E:178a-9: g-yon gdugs dkar mo bzung ba /
T02TD3083E:178a-10: pad zla'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs shing sgeg pa'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-11: de dbu rgyan dang rna rgyan la sogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan du mas spras par lta'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-12: spro na ri khrod ma dang legs ldan gyis bskor bar bsam mo //
T02TD3083E:178a-13: de la aom gyi 'od kyis ye shes pa dgug gzhug cing dbang du bya'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-14: de nyid la dbang bskur la /
T02TD3083E:178a-15: bee ro tsa nas dbu rgyan no //
T02TD3083E:178a-16: de'i thugs kar 'phags ma mtshon gang ba aom dang bcas par blta'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-17: de nyid las skyo bar gyur na ye shes kyi lha mdun du bkug la phyag dang mchod bstod byas nas thugs ka gnyis su aom la sngags kyis bskor bar dmigs nas /
T02TD3083E:178a-18: zhal dang lte bar 'gal me ltar 'khor bas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon la sogs pa bsregs par bsams nas /
T02TD3083E:178a-20: aom aa na le aa na le /
T02TD3083E:178a-21: bi sha de bi sha de /
T02TD3083E:178a-24: bandha bandha ni badzra p'a ni phat /
T02TD3083E:178a-25: h'um h'um phat phat h'um drum bandha phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3083E:178a-26: 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3083E:178a-27: de nas thun mtshams su mdun gyi ye shes pa la dmigs pa'i mdo dang /
T02TD3083E:178a-28: lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma btang nas /
T02TD3083E:178a-30: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3083E:178a-32: // / lo ts'a ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
